problem_statement: Create a comprehensive, automated test suite (Vitest + Testing Library) for the editor app that validates formatTime.ts and the UI/interaction contracts of EditPage.tsx, TextEditorModal.tsx, TrimTools.tsx, and Header.tsx by providing deterministic unit and integration tests, mocks for storage/network, organized fixtures, and CI-ready scripts that ensure high coverage and measurable, reproducible behavior
PASS_TO_PASS: formatTime Edge cases should return "0:00" for zero seconds
formatTime Edge cases should return "0:00" for negative values
formatTime Standard time formatting should format 59 seconds correctly
formatTime Standard time formatting should format 60 seconds (1 minute) correctly
formatTime Standard time formatting should format large values correctly
Header Initial render should render the header element
Header Initial render should display the application title
Header Accessibility should be accessible by role
TextEditorModal Initial render and visibility should render when isOpen is true
TextEditorModal Button interactions should call onClose when Cancel button is clicked
TextEditorModal Button interactions should call onSave with correct parameters when Save is clicked
TextEditorModal Text input interactions should update text when user types
TextEditorModal Color picker interactions should update color when changed
TextEditorModal Focus management should have focusable text input
TrimTools Initial render should render TrimTools component
TrimTools Initial render should display video duration with 2 decimal places
TrimTools Initial render should display start and end trim percentages
EditPage Initial render should render EditPage component
EditPage Initial render should render Header component
EditPage UI Controls should render Add Text button
EditPage TextEditorModal interactions should open TextEditorModal when Add Text button is clicked
EditPage TextEditorModal interactions should close modal when Cancel is clicked
EditPage TextEditorModal interactions should add text overlay when Save is clicked in modal
EditPage Zoom Tool functionality should show zoom controls when zoom button is clicked
EditPage Zoom Tool functionality should allow updating zoom start time
App Initial render should render App component
App Initial render should render EditPage component
App Initial render should initialize EditPage with null videoUrl
